March 18 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA - PROVIDES UPDATE ON PROGRESS OF ACQUISITION OF OSISOFT *AVEVA - RECEIVED ALL ANTITRUST AND REGULATORY CLEARANCES REQUIRED AHEAD OF COMPLETION OF OSISOFT DEAL, INCLUDING CLEARANCE BY COMMITTEE ON CFIUS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 18-MAR-202107:00:06 GMT
